State of Kentucky
McLean County -- Sct

I Douglas Little Presiding Judge for McLean County Kentucky do hereby certify that John F Kimbly Surgeon, Personally appeared before me and took the following oath to wit: I John F Kimbley do solemnly swear that I will faithfully support the constitution of the United States And the constitution of Kentucky And will discharge all and singular the duties and servics appertaining to the office of Surgeon in the volunteer militia agreeably the Law and general regulations and will obey said such orders and instructions as I shall receive from time to time receive from the proper officers, Which is hereby certified to General head quarters.
Given under My hand at Calhoon Ky 23rd Day of November 1861.

Douglas Little
P. J McLean county
